rule.name: Komento Add Comment
rule.description: Give points when registered user add new comment.

rule.name: Komento Reply Comment
rule.description: Give points when registered user reply to a comment.

rule.name: Komento Add Comment to Article Author
rule.description: Give points to article's author when a comment is added on that article

rule.name: Komento Comment Removed
rule.description: Deduct points to the author when the comment has been removed.

rule.name: Komento Remove Comment from Article Author
rule.description: Deduct points to article's author when a comment is removed from that article

rule.name: Komento Like Comment
rule.description: Assign points when a user like a comment.

rule.name: Komento Unlike Comment
rule.description: Deduct points when a user unlike a comment.

rule.name: Komento Comment has been liked
rule.description: Assign points to the author when the comment has been liked.

rule.name: Komento Comment has been unliked
rule.description: Deduct points to the author when the comment has been unliked.

rule.name: Komento Report Comment
rule.description: Assign points when a user report a comment.

rule.name: Komento Comment Reported
rule.description: Deduct points to the author when the comment has been reported.

rule.name: Komento Unreport Comment
rule.description: Deduct points when a user unreport a comment.

rule.name: Komento Comment Unreported
rule.description: Add points to the author when the comment has been unreported.

rule.name: Komento Comment Sticked
rule.description: Assign points to the author when the comment has been sticked.

rule.name: Komento Comment Unsticked
rule.description: Deduct points to the author when the comment has been unsticked.
